analysis.description:
Crowdsale.hasBalance (/unique_chucks/14/0x5c9f77612069eabd4b06be53d67e3f16af2d8436.sol#581-592) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- allocatedIndex[_beneficiary].length > 0 && _releaseDate == allocatedIndex[_beneficiary][allocated[_beneficiary][_releaseDate].index]

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.endCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/14/0x5c9f77612069eabd4b06be53d67e3f16af2d8436.sol#745-776):
	External calls:
	- ! token.unlock() (/unique_chucks/14/0x5c9f77612069eabd4b06be53d67e3f16af2d8436.sol#754-755)
	- totalTokenSupply = token.totalSupply() + allocatedTokens (/unique_chucks/14/0x5c9f77612069eabd4b06be53d67e3f16af2d8436.sol#757-758)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allocatedTokens (/unique_chucks/14/0x5c9f77612069eabd4b06be53d67e3f16af2d8436.sol#764-766)

NUCrowdsale.retreiveTokens (/unique_chucks/14/0x5c9f77612069eabd4b06be53d67e3f16af2d8436.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenInstance.transfer(beneficiary,tokenBalance) (/unique_chucks/14/0x5c9f77612069eabd4b06be53d67e3f16af2d8436.sol)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.endCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/14/0x5c9f77612069eabd4b06be53d67e3f16af2d8436.sol#745-776):
	External calls:
	- ! token.unlock() (/unique_chucks/14/0x5c9f77612069eabd4b06be53d67e3f16af2d8436.sol#754-755)
	- totalTokenSupply = token.totalSupply() + allocatedTokens (/unique_chucks/14/0x5c9f77612069eabd4b06be53d67e3f16af2d8436.sol#757-758)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allocated (/unique_chucks/14/0x5c9f77612069eabd4b06be53d67e3f16af2d8436.sol#764-766)
	- allocated (/unique_chucks/14/0x5c9f77612069eabd4b06be53d67e3f16af2d8436.sol#773-775)
	- allocatedEth (/unique_chucks/14/0x5c9f77612069eabd4b06be53d67e3f16af2d8436.sol#773-775)
	- allocatedIndex (/unique_chucks/14/0x5c9f77612069eabd4b06be53d67e3f16af2d8436.sol#764-766)
	- allocatedIndex (/unique_chucks/14/0x5c9f77612069eabd4b06be53d67e3f16af2d8436.sol#773-775)
